title: Persons entitled to file initial financing statement
context: ยง490:9-708 Persons entitled to file initial financing statement or continuation statement. A person may file an initial financing statement or a continuation statement under this part if: (1) The secured party of record authorizes the filing; and (2) The filing is necessary under this part: (A) To continue the effectiveness of a financing statement filed before this article takes effect; or (B) To perfect or continue the perfection of a security interest.
